text: "Eyes Without a Face" is a 1983 song by Billy Idol. It is the second single from his second studio album Rebel Yell. It went to number 4 in both the United States and New Zealand, number 18 in the United Kingdom and Italy, number 6 in Canada, number 10 in Germany, number 12 in Australia, number 13 in the Netherlands and Italy and number 21 in Switzerland. It is a more softer sounding from the album. ==Formats and track listings== *UK 7" vinyl single #"Eyes Without a Face" #"The Dead Next Door" *UK 12" vinyl single #"Eyes Without a Face" #"The Dead Next Door" #"Dancing With Myself" #"Rebel Yell" ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Billy Idol songs Category:Synth-pop songs
title: Eyes Without a Face (song)
